attributes.action: have a referendum on the new Reform Treaty as promosed in the Labour manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that huge elements of the EU Constitution are being brought in by the new 'Reform Treaty', it is time for the British people to have their say on our future relationship with the EU. I say, Let the People Decide. We have had enough of bungling politians, who think they know best, deciding against the will of the people!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
